defitem.label: Processed by: Hannah Bochain, Student Assistant and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains a summons to the sheriff of Bland County for the Wytheville Telephone Company for trespassing on the property of R. C. Green from 1889.

origination.label: Creator
origination.persname: Muncy, C. P. , Clerk, Bland County Circuit Court

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Wytheville Telephone Company Summons must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Wytheville Telephone Company Summons , Ms2013-049, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Wytheville Telephone Company Summons was purchased by Special Collections in June 2013.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Wytheville Telephone Company Summons was completed in August 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a summons to the sheriff of Bland County for the Wytheville Telephone Company for trespassing on the property of R. C. Green. The summons was issued in Bland County on November 23, 1889 for a court appearance on the first Monday in December of the same year. Green appeared to be suing for $5000 in damages.
